abstract: Hungarian soldiers will build fence along country's boarder with Serbia in effort stem flow of migrants.
lead_paragraph: Using materials prepared by inmates in Hungarian prisons, 900 soldiers will build a fence along Hungary’s border with Serbia to stem the flow of migrants.

headline.main: Hungary: Inmates Help Prepare Fence to Bar Migrants
headline.print_headline: Europe; Hungary: Inmates Help Prepare Fence to Bar Migrants

snippet: Using materials prepared by inmates in Hungarian prisons, 900 soldiers will build a fence along Hungary’s border with Serbia to stem the flow of migrants.
